s0581.chinese: 二十年，王之漢中，又之上郡、北河。
s0581.literal: Twentieth year, king went to Hanzhong, then went to Shang commandery, Beihe.
s0581.idiomatic: Twentieth year, king went to Hanzhong, then went to Shang commandery, Beihe.

s0582.literal: Twenty-first year, Cuo attacked Wei's Henei.
s0582.idiomatic: Twenty-first year, Cuo attacked Wei's Henei.

s0583.chinese: 魏獻安邑，秦出其人，募徙河東賜爵，赦罪人遷之。
s0583.literal: Wei offered Anyi, Qin moved its people out, recruited migrants to Hedong granting noble ranks, pardoned criminals and moved them there.
s0583.idiomatic: Wei offered Anyi, Qin moved its people out, recruited migrants to Hedong granting noble ranks, pardoned criminals and moved them there.

s0585.literal: Twenty-second year, Meng Wu attacked Qi.
s0585.idiomatic: Twenty-second year, Meng Wu attacked Qi.

s0587.literal: Met with Chu king at Wan.
s0587.idiomatic: Met with Chu king at Wan.

s0588.literal: Met with Zhao king at Zhongyang.
s0588.idiomatic: Met with Zhao king at Zhongyang.

s0589.chinese: 二十三年，尉斯離與三晉、燕伐齊，破之濟西。
s0589.literal: Twenty-third year, Yu Si Li with three Jin and Yan attacked Qi, defeated them west of Ji.
s0589.idiomatic: Twenty-third year, Yu Si Li with three Jin and Yan attacked Qi, defeated them west of Ji.

s0590.chinese: 王與魏王會宜陽，與韓王會新城。
s0590.literal: King met with Wei king at Yiyang, met with Han king at Xincheng.
s0590.idiomatic: King met with Wei king at Yiyang, met with Han king at Xincheng.

s0591.chinese: 二十四年，與楚王會鄢，又會穰。
s0591.literal: Twenty-fourth year, met with Chu king at Yan, again met at Rang.
s0591.idiomatic: Twenty-fourth year, met with Chu king at Yan, again met at Rang.

s0592.chinese: 秦取魏安城，至大梁，燕、趙救之，秦軍去。
s0592.literal: Qin took Wei's Ancheng, reached Daxiang, Yan and Zhao rescued them, Qin army withdrew.
s0592.idiomatic: Qin took Wei's Ancheng, reached Daxiang, Yan and Zhao rescued them, Qin army withdrew.

s0594.literal: Twenty-fifth year, took two Zhao cities.
s0594.idiomatic: Twenty-fifth year, took two Zhao cities.

s0595.chinese: 與韓王會新城，與魏王會新明邑。
s0595.literal: Met with Han king at Xincheng, met with Wei king at Xinmingyi.
s0595.idiomatic: Met with Han king at Xincheng, met with Wei king at Xinmingyi.

s0596.chinese: 二十六年，赦罪人遷之穰。
s0596.literal: Twenty-sixth year, pardoned criminals and moved them to Rang.
s0596.idiomatic: Twenty-sixth year, pardoned criminals and moved them to Rang.

s0599.literal: Pardoned criminals and moved them to Nanyang.
s0599.idiomatic: Pardoned criminals and moved them to Nanyang.
